Wineries Napa Valley's deep roots produce world-class wine. Enjoy intimate winery tastings, expansive outdoor spaces, and behind-the-scenes private tours of wine cellars and caves. Restaurants With farm-fresh cuisine ranging from casual food trucks to Michelin-Star fare, you‚Äôll find unforgettable meals to complement our world-class wines around every corner. Things To Do Napa Valley is better than ever, and we‚Äôre excited to invite you to explore all that our legendary valley has to offer. Discover hot air balloons, outdoors, shopping, art walks, personal tours, wine & cooking classes, and more. Events From winery parties and winemaker dinners, to concerts and farmers markets ‚Äì there are so many ways to experience a taste of the good life in Napa Valley wine country Maps & Travel Info Find all the resources you will need to plan a relaxing and fun filled getaway to Napa Valley Where To Stay From intimate boutique inns to full-service luxury resorts, and everything in between, Napa Valley properties welcome you with world-class hospitality. Discover hot air balloons, outdoors, shopping, art walks, personal tours, wine & cooking classes, and more. He spent many years leading operations for luxury hotels and resorts between Boston and NYC. Ed serves as the General Manager for Carneros Resort and Spa, where he oversees operations for the 28-acre luxury resort and has led the team to numerous awards and accolades during his tenure. Nathan Davis General Manager, Napa Valley Wine Train Before joining the Napa Valley Wine Train in 2021, Nathan served as Managing Director & General Manager at Harvest Inn in St. Helena, and prior to that was the General Manager at the Bodega Bay Lodge of the Woodside Hotel Group. From 2014-2017, he was the Resort Manager for the Silverado Resort and Spa in Napa. Previously, Nathan spent four years with Kimpton Hotels in San Francisco, and eight years with Starwood Hotels and Resorts. Robby Delaney General Manager, Four Seasons Resort and Residences As a San Diego native, Robby Delaney has 16 years in luxury hospitality, all with Four Seasons (San Diego, Denver, Scottsdale, Los Angeles, Seattle, and Maui). He is now the General Manager at the 5 star, 85 room, 20 residence Four Seasons in Calistoga. Patrick Egan Senior Vice President of Marketing & Communications, Boisset Collection Patrick Egan is the Senior Vice President of Marketing & Communications for the Boisset Collection, where he has shaped marketing, e-commerce and communications strategies since joining the company in 2004, including Napa Valley‚Äôs Raymond Vineyards, JCB, Oakville Grocery, Chateau Buena Vista, Elizabeth Spencer and the Calistoga Depot. A resident of Napa Valley since 2010, Patrick is an engaged member of the community, and a member of the first cohort of the Napa Valley Vintner‚Äôs Napa Leadership program. Dave Elcon General Manager, Solage, Auberge Resorts Collection Dave is the General Manager at Solage Resort where he oversees all facets of the 22 acre luxury property.  He previously served as the opening General Manager of The Inn at Mattei‚Äôs Tavern, an Auberge property located in Santa Barbara wine country.  With over 20 years of luxury hospitality experience, Dave has a proven track record of building exceptional teams that have garnered countless awards and accolades under his leadership. He has been with Auberge Resorts for the past 6 years and is passionate about contributing to the success of the Napa Valley. Linsey Gallagher President & CEO, Visit Napa Valley Linsey Gallagher is President and CEO of Visit Napa Valley (VNV), the official destination management organization for Napa County. VNV promotes the region as an attractive travel destination and enhances its reputation as a dynamic place to visit, live and work. Linsey serves on the Board of Directors of US Travel, CalTravel, and Visit California. Previously, she spent 10 years working at Wine Institute as Vice President of International Marketing, leading the California Wine Export Program with programs in more than 25 countries worldwide. She has also worked for E&J Gallo Winery, NBC TODAY Show, and GE Capital Services. Jeri Hansen President & CEO, Napa Chamber of Commerce Jeri Hansen joined the Napa Chamber of Commerce as President & CEO in January 2023. She was Principal at Jeri Hansen Company, specializing in community engagement, public policy, and strategic planning.¬†Previous to starting her own firm in 2020, Jeri was CEO of Sustainable Napa County and was a member of the Napa County Planning Commission. She was appointed by Governor Jerry Brown to the Napa Valley Exposition (25th District Agricultural Association) Board of Directors in 2014 and is currently President of the Board. Rick Kaufman Owner, Harvest Inn Rick Kaufman, the founder of City-Core Development, Inc., has enjoyed a 30-year journey in commercial real estate investment, with a keen focus on successful planning and development. His diverse projects include the conversion of former shipyards, redevelopment of food factories, and a special dedication to hotels. In the Napa Valley, Rick is an owner of the Harvest Inn in St. Helena and the Old Soda Springs Winery. Joe Leinacker Managing Director, The Meritage Resort and Spa Joe Leinacker has been the Managing Director of The Meritage Resort, Vista Collina Resort, and Vino Bello Resort since 2020.  Before moving to Napa, Joe served as the General Manager of the award winning Pasea Hotel & Spa in Huntington Beach, CA.  Originally from Topeka, KS, Joe enjoys playing golf, dinner and drinks with friends, and spending time with his two dogs Willow and Miley Cyrus. Patrick Nayrolles General Manager, Meadowood Napa Valley As general manager of Meadowood Napa Valley, Patrick Nayrolles is the consummate host with his pulse on the day-to-day operations and guest relations of the historic estate. With a hospitality pedigree and a resume that includes overseeing some of the finest hotels and resorts worldwide, Patrick began his tenure as Meadowood‚Äôs general manager in 2015, a position his father held from 1986 to 1994. Jason Scoggins Co-founder & Partner, Latitude 38 Entertainment In 2001 Jason co-founded Jumpstart Automotive Media a vertical advertising network focused on the automotive industry and served as chief partnership officer until the company was acquired in 2007 by Hachette Filipacchi Media U.S., a Lagardere subsidiary, which owns the Car and Driver, Road & Track and Cycle World brands.  He was also an early employee at consumer Internet startup OpenAuto.com and AutoWeb.com. Jason co-founded Latitude 38 Entertainment (L38), a premium entertainment company located in the Napa Valley, producing world-class events including BottleRock Napa Valley. Jason holds a BA from Arizona State University. Jason was born, raised in Napa and currently lives in Yountville. Todd Shallan Vice President & Managing Director, Silverado Resort Todd Shallan is the Vice President and Managing Director of Silverado Resort, where he oversees all aspects of the resort, club, and spa operations. He previously served as Chief Operating Officer, Hospitality Division, at Alterra Mountain Company, where he was responsible for the overall operations of lodging, food & beverage, clubs, golf and retail for the 15 owned resorts in the company. He brings 40 years of resort, hospitality, and recreation industry experience from roles in housekeeping, front desk, guest services, restaurants, banquets, convention services and group sales at an extensive list of prestigious properties, including the St. Francis Hotel in San Francisco, Ritz- Carlton in Palm Springs and The Boca Raton Resort and Club in South Florida. David Shipman General Manager, White House Napa David R. Shipman, General Manager of The Citizen Hotel, an Autograph Collection Hotel in Sacramento, California, and the White House Inn in Napa, California is a well-respected ‚Äúprogressive‚Äù hospitality executive, with more than 25 years of luxury hotel expertise. Mr. Shipman has made his mark in several management positions, working at the luxury Auberge Du Soleil in Rutherford, California, and at the Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company in Aspen, Colorado.  In 1998, Shipman joined the opening team of Villagio Inn & Spa and Vintage Inn. Until 2013, Shipman held the role of Managing Director.  In 2016, Shipman was pre-opening General Manager of Las Alcobas a Luxury Collection Hotel in St Helena California.  A native of Washington State, Mr. Shipman has shown leadership abilities and expertise in developing and implementing strategic plans for hotel openings, re-structuring hotel operations, and ownership and guest relations, and has paved the way for highly successful property positioning and team building. Emma Swain CEO, St. Sup√©ry Estate Vineyards and Winery Emma Swain, CEO of St. Sup√©ry Estate Vineyards and Winery has worked in the wine industry for more than 20 years. Emma started in finance, before joining St. Sup√©ry Estate Vineyards and Winery and became CEO in 2009. Emma is a past chair and currently serves on the Board for the Wine Market Council, and is a past board chair of the Napa Valley Vintners. Jenny Toomer General Manager, River Terrace Inn With over 25 years in the hospitality industry Jenny‚Äôs first hotel was at the Fairmont Hotel in San Francisco.  After spending 12 years in the city, working as a Sales & Marketing Leader, primarily with Kimpton Hotels,  she moved to Napa in 2011 to work in wine tourism and fell in love with hospitality even more. Through volunteer involvements with Festival Napa Valley, Jameson Animal Rescue and Auction Napa Valley she became deeply invested in the success of the valley. Today she continues to participate in key efforts that help support keeping the valley such a special place, along with making it a premier destination for visitors and for the community who is lucky enough to call it home. Rachel Wilson General Manager, Napa Valley Marriott Hotel & Spa Rachel Wilson is currently the General Manager for the Napa Valley Marriott Hotel and Spa, a beautiful 275 room property right off highway 29. A great location allowing guests to explore the Napa Valley and Sonoma with ease. Previously, Wilson lead The Source Hotel and Market Hall located in the RINO area in Denver, CO. Wilson joined the Sage Independent Collection in July 2021 in the role of Hotel General Manager for The Hotel Zags Portland. Prior to joining the Sage family, Wilson held multiple positions with Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants, including serving as General Manager for Oregon‚Äôs Hotel Vintage Portland. In this role, she won Best Director of 2020 from the Pebblebrook Hotel's Annual Pebby Awards, raised the guest satisfaction scores to reflect the hotel's exceptional service, and created a workplace culture that allowed its staff to learn and grow. Wilson is a graduate of California State University Channel Islands. About ‚Äî MANOR TAVERN Menus About Catering and Events Reservations Gift Cards Contact Back Lunch Dinner Dessert Brunch Bar Menu Wine Bottle List Wine by the Glass Specialty Cocktails WEEKLY SPECIALS Back Manor Events & Wine Suppers Catering at Manor Tavern Catering Off Premise Menus Lunch Dinner Dessert Brunch Bar Menu Wine Bottle List Wine by the Glass Specialty Cocktails WEEKLY SPECIALS About Catering and Events Manor Events & Wine Suppers Catering at Manor Tavern Catering Off Premise Reservations Gift Cards Contact THE HISTORY Come Out to the Country, We‚Äôre Worth the Drive The Manor Tavern is a picturesque, 267 year old property dating back to the time of George Washington and is said to have housed the first president‚Äôs horse on occasion. In fact, the area began as a stable and over the years had evolved into a blacksmith shop, a general store and a saloon. Our logo, inclusive of a horse, is a hat tip to our historic roots here in Monkton. Today, it‚Äôs a country oasis in the heart of steeplechase land where friends and family gather for delectable food and exquisite service. Like our history here in Maryland, our patrons are loyal and longstanding. We value the relationships we have cultivated with all of you year after year. FARM-TO-TABLE At the Manor Tavern, taste is everything. Our grounds allow us to control all aspects of the growing process from our farm to your table. We are always open to suggestions so share with us any specific herbs or produce you‚Äôd like to see in our garden. Optimal Freshness Our produce is generally harvested when we need it. When a fruit or vegetable is given the time to completely ripen, it fully develops and retains its vitamins and minerals, giving it a more vibrant flavor and maximizing the nutritional content. Our large variety of items have a longer time to ripen ‚Äúon the vine‚Äù ultimately eliminating travel time and processing and optimizing the taste and texture of our food. Community Each item that we grow has its own unique story. Growing and buying locally means you are supporting the family farmers and ranchers that raised your food. Connecting to the sources is a very meaningful part of the overall experience. Our selection of available produce changes weekly, dependent upon what is readily available in our area. This allows us to deliver items when they are at their peak, are most abundant, and in the case of farmers markets, least expensive. Managing Partner, The Manor Group Jerry Edwards, CPCE Founder of Chef‚Äôs Expressions at the Manor, NACE Hall of Fame Inductee, Hospitality Industry Icon Award Winner From 1981 to 2020, Jerry was Founder and Owner of Chef‚Äôs Expressions Catering and Events, which has twice been named The National Catering Company of the Year. Jerry holds an honorary doctorate in hospitality.¬†In 2008, he was inducted into the NACE Hall of Fame. In 2015, Jerry was honored as a National Industry Icon by the hospitality community. He has won over 50 industry competitions including Baltimore‚Äôs Best Crab Soup, three ACF Gold Medals, the ‚ÄúBest Chef‚Äù for the Meals on Wheels Culinary Extravaganza, The Crystal Toque Award in the Nation‚Äôs Capitol, The Special Event Award for best event, Baltimore‚Äôs ‚ÄúIron Chef‚Äù competition and the Mid-Atlantic Taste of Elegance competition. Today, Jerry leads the team of professionals at The Manor Tavern.¬† These outstanding individuals include Alicia Strawderman, Director of Chef‚Äôs Expressions at The Manor, Luis Banegas, Manor Tavern Restaurant Manager, Zoltan Dober-Huang and Executive Chef Sebastien Lemarre. Our team is here to serve you and create an unparalleled experience. Restaurant Manager, The Manor Tavern Luis Banegas Luis began his career with Chef‚Äôs Expressions in 1997. His infectious smile and dedication to serving guests quickly propelled him to become the top catering manager. He later managed the Chef‚Äôs Expressions operations team for over 10 years, honing his skills in leadership and customer service. With extensive experience in fine dining and exceptional hospitality, Luis is now the perfect choice to manage The Manor Tavern. This storied restaurant has undergone a renaissance under a new management team, bringing fresh enthusiasm and innovative ideas to the Tavern. Be sure to stop in and see Luis or Assistant Manager/ Sommelier Zoltan Dober -Huang, soon. Their warm welcome and exceptional service are sure to enhance your dining experience. Executive Chef, The Manor Tavern Restaurant Sebastien Lemarre Chef Sebastien brings a wealth of culinary expertise and leadership to The Manor Tavern, elevating its dining and catering experiences. With a distinguished career as both a Chef and Culinary Instructor, Sebastien has seamlessly integrated into The Manor Tavern team, sharing his knowledge in culinary arts and management. Under his leadership, he has built a talented team of chefs and cooks dedicated to delivering some of the finest restaurant and catering cuisine in the region. His impressive r√©sum√© includes serving as Executive Chef at Hunt Valley Country Club and contributing to World Central Kitchen as Director of Relief Training and Director of Culinary Training. His passion for culinary education has also been a significant asset to The Manor Tavern. He previously held roles as Culinary Arts Instructor and Coordinator in Mayag√ºez, as well as Culinary Arts Academy Director at Escuela Hotelera de San Juan. Sebastien‚Äôs dedication to culinary excellence and mentorship continues to shape and strengthen The Manor Tavern‚Äôs culinary offerings. Assistant Manager, The Manor Tavern Zoltan Dober - Huang Zolt√°n was born in Budapest, Hungary, and raised in San Jose, California. A recent Maryland transplant, he‚Äôs eager to explore everything the Chesapeake Bay State has to offer. With extensive experience in every Front of House role, Zolt√°n brings a deep understanding of hospitality to his managerial responsibilities. Having lived in California‚Äôs renowned wine regions, he developed a passion for winemaking and tasting, which he now shares as the leader of The Manor Tavern‚Äôs wine education program. He also curates weekly wine initiatives, including complimentary tastings and wine-by-the-glass specials, to enhance the guest experience. Zolt√°n‚Äôs ultimate dream is to own a chic cocktail and wine club featuring live jazz every night. In the meantime, he‚Äôs dedicated to bringing that same energy and creativity to The Manor Tavern. 410.771.8155 info@manortavern.com Hours VISIT US HOURS 15819 Old York Rd. Monkton, MD, 21111 410.771.8155 Inquiries RESTAURANT HOURS Lunch - 11:00-4:00 Wednesday to Saturday Dinner - Tuesday to Saturday 4:00-9:00 (last seating) Sunday Brunch - 11:00-3:00 Sunday Dinner - 3:00 - 8:00 BAR HOURS Tuesday open 4:00 until 9:00 Wednesday, Thursday open until 10:00 Friday and Saturday open until 11:00 Sunday open until 9:00

Follow View all 284 employees Report this company About us Welcome to Streamsong, the only warm weather destination with three courses in the "Top 40 You Can Play" in the United States.  
Streamsong is a resort where golf is both a quest for perfection and an art form. A place where the surrounding ecosystems are as deeply valued as the time you‚Äôll spend with us.

Situated amid thousands of acres of stunning scenery and hushed seclusion in Central Florida, Streamsong is a one-of-a-kind golf destination created in complete harmony with its natural surroundings. The uniqueness is immediately unveiled from the very moment you arrive and the memories you make here will surely last a lifetime. A quiet place far from the concrete, crowds, and chaos. Here you will experience the only place in the world with Coore/Crenshaw, Doak, and Hanse/Wagner designed courses in the same location along with a modern lakeside lodge offering spacious, luxurious accommodations, outstanding dining, a relaxing spa, and an array of exhilarating outdoor adventures unmatched in Florida.  It‚Äôs just you, your friends, and the game you love. For more information, visit www.streamsongresort.com.

Join us at Streamsong Resort for our Job Fair on Thursday, August 14, and explore opportunities to be part of one of Florida‚Äôs most unique and award-winning golf destinations.

We‚Äôre seeking passionate professionals across multiple departments, including hospitality, golf operations, culinary, recreation, and more. If you‚Äôre looking to grow your career in an inspiring and team-driven environment, this is your chance.

üìç Streamsong Resort

Bring your resume, meet our leadership team, and discover how you can be part of the extraordinary. 64 1 Comment Like Comment Share Streamsong Resort reposted this Florida of Tomorrow 9,489 followers 3mo Report this post Set on 16,000 acres of dramatic terrain shaped by former phosphate mines in Central Florida, Streamsong Resort defies expectations with a landscape that feels more like Scotland or Australia than the Sunshine State. It‚Äôs home to three nationally ranked golf courses‚ÄîRed, Blue, and Black‚Äîdesigned by legends Coore & Crenshaw, Tom Doak, and Gil Hanse, each earning spots among the top courses in the country. A new short course, The Chain, adds a casual, match-play experience, while a recently announced fifth championship course by David McLay Kidd is now officially underway.

At the center of it all is Streamsong‚Äôs architecturally striking lodge, stacked with amenities including an infinity-edge pool, 360¬∫ rooftop bar, sports simulators, and a standout collection of restaurants. Beyond the fairways, the resort also offers bass fishing, clay shooting, archery, and nature trails‚Äîrounding out a destination that‚Äôs anything but ordinary.

Read more: https://lnkd.in/ePgCb8-y 82 2 Comments Like Comment Share Streamsong Resort reposted this The Beyond Collection 8,317 followers 5mo Report this post üèåÔ∏è‚ôÇÔ∏èü•ÇThere‚Äôs nothing better than great golf with great company, and Streamsong Resort is built for unforgettable group experiences. Set on a stunning landscape of rolling dunes and native grasses, this is Central Florida like you‚Äôve never seen it before. Once a working phosphate mine, Streamsong has been transformed into a golfer‚Äôs paradise, where nature and the game blend seamlessly. 

But the experience doesn‚Äôt stop when the final putt drops. Unwind in luxury accommodations and indulge in outstanding dining. For those looking to recharge beyond the course, the AcquaPietra Spa offers world-class treatments, tranquil soaking pools, and a serene escape to relax and recover. Adventure extends beyond the fairways with outdoor recreation activities to explore, from guided bass fishing to archery and sporting clay shooting. üé£

More than just golf‚Äîthis is an unforgettable retreat. General Manager Streamsong Resort, Bowling Green, FL 92 1 Comment Like Comment Share Streamsong Resort reposted this Erica Espe Vice President of Marketing | Driving Growth for Golf Clubs & Sports Venues Through Revenue Strategy + AI Innovation 10mo Report this post üåü Exciting Career Opportunity at Streamsong Golf Resort! Streamsong Resort is looking for a Director of Sales & Marketing to lead our strategic vision and operational excellence in one of the most unique golf destinations in the country. This full-time, on-site role will be responsible for directing the resort‚Äôs sales and marketing efforts, inspiring a team of talented professionals, and delivering exceptional golfer and guest experiences.

The ideal candidate will bring:
	‚Ä¢	10+ years of sales & marketing experience with a successful record of achieving revenue goals
